Class Box<T extends Serializable>

  • Object
    • ca.qc.johnabbott.cs406.Box<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Box<T extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Box class - Stores a value in a box. Example of serialization for generic classes. Format: 1. Serial representation of the value.
